description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a login screen, allowing users to sign in via a token. It manages user input, interacts with authentication provider, and handles navigation upon login.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the login screen with token input and sign-in functionality.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the LoginScreen widget.

methods.name: _signIn
methods.description: Handles the sign-in process by validating token input and performing authentication, with error handling and navigation.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the login UI, including input fields, buttons, and layout styling.
